item.title: Lightning updates / Stratum V2
item.description: Murch: 00:00:00 Hey Jonas. Jonas: 00:00:00 Hey Murch. Murch: 00:00:02 What are we up to? Jonas: 00:00:03 We are back. Murch: 00:00:04 Who are we recording today? Jonas: 00:00:05 We have Steve Lee in the office this week. Murch: 00:00:04 He is the head at Spiral. He’s done a lot of open source development. He talks to a bunch of people. He’s also the PM for the LDK team. So we’re going to talk Lightning, the challenges that are open with Lightning, and maybe a little bit about other projects in the space.
